One Way is a 2022 American action crime thriller film written by Ben Conway and directed by Andrew Baird. Principal photography began in 2021. The film stars Colson Baker, Kevin Bacon and Travis Fimmel.


Premise[edit]
Freddy is on the run with a bag full of cash after a robbery of his crime boss. Badly wounded and betrayed by his father, Freddy gets on a dirty bus where he meets a mysterious girl and a creepy one.

Cast[edit]
Colson Baker as Frederick "Freddy" Sullivan, a young Crime Gang son of Fred Sr.
Kevin Bacon as Fred Sullivan Sr., a Crime Boss fortunate drug smuggling father of Freddy.
Travis Fimmel as Will
Drea de Matteo as Victoria Menendez, a female crime queenpin boss organization.
Storm Reid as Rachel
Luis Da Silva as JJ
Rhys Coiro as Coco
Meagan Holder as Christine
Danny Bohnen as Oleg
Scotty Bohnen as Caleb
K.D. O'Hair as Helen
Thomas Francis Murphy as Patrick, the bus driver
Casie Baker as Lily
Jaylen Hodby as Hoodlum #1
Production[edit]
On September 11, 2020, it was announced that Colson Baker and Travis Fimmel were cast in the film.[1] On November 2, 2020, it was announced that Kevin Bacon joined the cast.[2] On February 8, 2021, Storm Reid joined the cast.[3]
Principal photography began on February 2, 2021 in Thomasville, Georgia.[4]

Release[edit]
Saban Films released the film in theaters and through video on demand in the United States on September 2, 2022.[5]

Reception[edit]
On the review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, 53% of 17 critics' reviews are positive, with an average rating of 5.4/10.[6] Metacritic, which uses a weighted average, assigned the film a score of 46 out of 100, based on 4 critics, indicating "mixed or average" reviews.[7]

^ Kroll, Justin (February 8, 2021). "Storm Reid Joins Kevin Bacon, Colson Baker And Travis Fimmel In 'One Way'". Deadline Hollywood. Retrieved February 19, 2021.

^ Vlessing, Etan (February 10, 2021). "Bay Point Media Finances Kevin Bacon's 'One Way' Crime Thriller". The Hollywood Reporter. Retrieved February 19, 2021.

^ Tapp, Tom (August 4, 2022). "'One Way' Trailer: Colson "Machine Gun Kelly" Baker Is On The Run From A Menacing Crime Boss". Deadline. Retrieved August 15, 2022.

^ "One Way". Rotten Tomatoes. Fandango Media. Retrieved March 8, 2024. 

^ "One Way". Metacritic. Fandom, Inc. Retrieved 8 March 2024.
